name: m4l-launchpad-sequencer
description: A step sequencer for the Novation Launchpad, for use with Ableton Live and Max for Live.

scripts.ci: npm run test-strict && npm run build
scripts.release: npm run build && zip -r launchpad-sequencer.zip example-project launchpad-sequencer/launchpad-sequencer.amxd launchpad-sequencer/launchpad-sequencer-io-ch1.amxd launchpad-sequencer/launchpad-sequencer-io-ch3.amxd

author: Adam Murray
